locationSection.intro: Arenal Bol in Pilar de La Horadada represents one of the Costa Blanca's most vibrant and desirable residential areas. Located on Spain's southeastern coast in Alicante province, this picturesque neighborhood combines authentic Mediterranean charm with modern amenities and international convenience. The area has become increasingly popular among foreign investors and expat communities who appreciate its relaxed lifestyle, exceptional climate, and proximity to essential services. Pilar de La Horadada has evolved into a cosmopolitan hub while retaining its traditional Spanish character, making it perfect for those seeking authentic Mediterranean living with contemporary comforts. The region boasts several championship-quality golf courses nearby, multiple pristine Blue Flag beaches just minutes away, and a well-developed healthcare infrastructure including both public and private medical facilities with English-speaking doctors. The established international community means English is commonly spoken throughout the area, simplifying daily life for foreign residents and creating a welcoming environment for newcomers.
